news.title: 特朗普推翻奥巴马时代温室气体危害认定
news.title0: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
news.content: 美国总统特朗普撤销了2009年一项关键科学认定，该认定是联邦所有遏制温室气体行动的法律基石。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has reversed a key Obama-era scientific ruling that underpins all federal actions on curbing planet-warming gases.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 挪威前首相因爱泼斯坦案被控严重腐败
news.title0: Norway's former PM charged with gross corruption over Epstein links
news.content: 挪威前首相托尔比约恩·亚格兰因与美国性犯罪者爱泼斯坦的关系，被警方指控犯有“严重腐败”罪。
news.content0: Former Norwegian Prime Minister Thorbjørn Jagland has been charged with "gross corruption" over his ties with the US sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, police have said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国温莎拒付国事访问费用
news.title0: We won't pay for Windsor state visits, council says
news.content: 英国温莎-梅登黑德区议会表示，在去年接待特朗普的费用未获报销后，将不再支持任何国事访问。
news.content0: A council has said it will not support any more state visits after the costs of hosting Donald Trump at Windsor Castle last year were not reimbursed.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 法官阻止美军降级参议员凯利军衔
news.title0: Judge blocks US military from demoting Mark Kelly over 'illegal orders' video
news.content: 美国联邦法官阻止国防部长降低参议员马克·凯利的军衔，因其曾发布视频鼓励军人拒绝非法命令。
news.content0: A federal judge has blocked Secretary of Defence Pete Hegseth from lowering Senator Mark Kelly's rank in the military over his urging service members to refuse illegal orders.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 爱尔兰为艺术家提供基本收入
news.title0: Ireland is paying artists a basic income in a pioneering scheme
news.content: 爱尔兰政府启动一项开创性计划，将在三年内为2000名艺术家提供每周325欧元的基本收入。
news.content0: The Irish government is implementing a pioneering scheme that will give 2,000 artists a basic income for three years, allowing them to focus on their creative output while maintaining an adequate standard of living.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 俄罗斯宣布封锁WhatsApp应用
news.title0: Russia says it has blocked WhatsApp amid wider clampdown on social media
news.content: 俄罗斯确认已在该国封锁即时通讯应用WhatsApp，并引导公民使用其国家支持的Max应用。
news.content0: Russia has confirmed that it has blocked instant messaging app WhatsApp in the country, instead directing Russian citizens to use its state-backed Max app.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 印尼计划将高速公路改为战机跑道
news.title0: Freeways as runways: Indonesia plans to turn its islands into cheaper ‘aircraft carriers’
news.content: 印尼计划将全国高速公路路段改造为战斗机紧急跑道，使其在广阔群岛拥有多个“航空母舰”。
news.content0: Indonesia is embarking on a plan to make toll roads across the country into emergency runways for its fighter jets, giving it the equivalent of multiple aircraft carriers across the vast archipelago.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国对索马里发动猛烈空袭
news.title0: As U.S. Bombs Somalia, Israel Shakes Status Quo on Horn of Africa
news.content: 特朗普政府上台以来，美军对索马里境内目标发动了约150次空袭，远超其他任何国家。
news.content0: When President Trump said in December that Somalia was“not even a country,”the U.S. military was in the midst of one of its most aggressive bombing campaigns that the East African nation has seen.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 诺奖得主帕慕克作品终获Netflix改编
news.title0: Nobel Novelist Orhan Pamuk Finally Gets the Netflix Series He Wanted
news.content: 土耳其诺贝尔文学奖得主奥尔罕·帕慕克历经波折，其小说《纯真博物馆》的改编权最终回归，并将由Netflix制作。
news.content0: Six years ago, the Turkish author and Nobel laureate Orhan Pamuk received the plot summary of a planned television adaptation of one of his most celebrated novels, “The Museum of Innocence.” As he flipped through its pages, he was horrified.
news.author: NYTimes
